description: News about the Metropolitan Museum of Art, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Metropolitan Museum of Art
title_page: Metropolitan Museum of Art - The New York Times
maintext:
From L.A. to Rome, Ancient Sculptures Get Heroâ€™s Welcome
Three statues were returned to Italy after the J. Paul Getty Museum discovered they had been looted. They will be displayed temporarily in Rome before heading to Taranto, Italy, their permanent home.
